description:
In episode 22, a new kind of Yokubaru debuted, summoned by Yamoh using one of Dokurokushe`s bones. The skull`s face is almost shaped the same, but one half of the face is lilac while the other is black with a dark aura surrounding that half. The eyes are also completely red.
Source: prettycure.wikia.com
name: Super Yokubaru
